pullrequest.title: pass string literal to project() to make the project name parsable

content.raw: The important part in the CMake docs about the installation prefixes searched by [find_package()](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.5/command/find_package.html) is the `*` after `<name>*`. So if two versions of a package `foo` install their CMake config and version files into `foo1` and `foo2` you can find_package them both using `find_package` and select the desired package based on the passed version (e.g. `find_package(foo 1)`). Imo that would be the "right" way to install this package.
